msg: check for HTTP_BAD_REQUEST code now that this is properly working

author: dougm
msg: dont block when handling non-ssl request

author: dougm
msg: fix ap_remove_output_filter; the recent change to use remove_any_filter made
it possible to wipe out the entire filter chain.  and then when
ap_finalize_request_protocol was called, r->output_filters was NULL,
preventing data from being flushed to the client.
